version_description:
You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Improved Postgame
• Post game menu now automatically submits the score after a few seconds.
• High scores are now tracked locally, so you can see how well you're doing as you get better.
• Early exit now available from the pause menu - if you're confident your score is good enough to win.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Bug Hunting
• Fixed a bug where new pieces would fail to show up.
• Corrected a display issue that could occur when placing new shapes onto spots that were just cleared.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

This update - Bugs, performance and a few tweaks. Mostly house cleaning.
• Nailed a few hard-to-find bugs that probably wouldn't mean anything to you ... but ... um, go team!
• Fixed some texture resolution issues on iPad.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Tightened up the graphics on Level 3
• Updating the style of the game board and shapes for a sharper, cleaner, faster experience. We hope you like it!

House Cleaning
• Updated to a new version of the Skillz platform with some optimizations, bug fixes and hopefully a new feature or two.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Minor update with performance tuning and bug hunting.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

New Logo - Check
• Updated the look and feel of the logo and home screen.

More Cowbell - Check
• Sounds and Music added!

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

More High Scores!
• Added a daily high score tracker so you can see how your game stacks up.

New Multiplayer Features
• Tiebreakers added! Ties used to refund your entry fee - now you get to play again to determine the winner.
• Bracketed tournaments have been added.

Battery Life Optimization
• We made key improvements to reduce the power consumption during gameplay.
New app store details. Same awesome gameplay.

Updated some graphics, streamlined the UI and fixed some bugs.
We hope you enjoy. ヽ(•‿•)ノ

New Icon, Graphics, and Music. Oh my!
